caption.p: Modelling of 55 with SARS CoV 3CL pro. The hydrogen bonds between the enzyme and the inhibitor are shown as green dashed lines, and the distances are shown in units of Å. The amino acid residues that contribute to van der Waals contacts with the inhibitor are shown as red arcs. (For interpretation of the references to colour in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the Web version of this article.)
